newsitem.title: USA: Fourth Shift launches new software product.
newsitem.headline: Fourth Shift launches new software product.

text.p: Fourth Shift Corp said Tuesday that new front-end software for its Manufacturing Software System (MSS) is now available to its customers.

The new Windows-like interface gives MSS users an enhanced tutorial system, customization options and more efficient navigation features, Fourth Shift said. MSS users currently enrolled in Fourth Shift's maintenance program will receive a free software upgrade to the new interface.
Fourth Shift designs software for manufacturing industry.
Its stock was down 1/8 Tuesday at 5-1/4.
